content:

The bomb can be a potent tool if used effectively against the bat and destroying walls to clear paths towards the goal located at (6, 6).

In this case, I will take the action of placing a bomb to maximize my offensive strategy against both the bat and clearing some walls nearby. Therefore, I will proceed to:
